Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (a == 0 && b == 0 && c == 0)              {                  str1 = "x = anything";              }              else if (a == 0 && b == 0)              {                  str1 = "x = nothing";              }              else              {                  if (a == 0)                  {                      solution1Real = -c / b;                  }                  else                  {                      double discriminant = b * b - 4 * a * c;                        if (discriminant == 0)                      {                          solution1Real = -b / (2 * a);                      }                      else if (discriminant > 0)                      {                          solution1Real = (-b + Math.Sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a);                          solution2Real = (-b - Math.Sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a);                      }                      else                      {                          solution1Real = -b / (2 * a);                          solution2Real = solution1Real;                            solution1Imag = Math.Sqrt(-discriminant) / (2 * a);                          solution2Imag = -solution1Imag;                      }                  }                  str1 = Format(solution1Real' solution1Imag);                  str2 = Format(solution2Real' solution2Imag);              }
